text:
I’ll sign off here. Please don’t bother with my last OFW mails. I don’t want it to be that way anymore.
You do what you need to do, but I want to separate business from pleasure and quit acting so butt hurt.
Tonight made a big impact on me. I realized that could be our future. Not the nonsense I’m creating.
I am hoping we can find time soon for a long walk or even better, the Dolar Shop or a window seat at Flo.
Be well, Christine
Sent:01/23/2024 at 01:15 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 01:33 PM)
Subject:After an Amazing Night
Attachments:IMG_1026.PNG (772 KB)
Message 685 of 4024
You keep saying that I have multiple WiFis in our home. I keep telling you that is untrue. My best guess is there is some sort of appliance network set
up. I wanted to help you, have offered daily, and you continue to refuse it. This, even though I have fixed any and every issue you have had
immediately and in front of you. Still happy to help. I still see issues.
Sent:01/23/2024 at 01:23 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/23/2024 at 01:33 PM)
Subject:WiFi
